title: The Burke and Wills Expedition 1860-1861 (MAC & PC)
creator_credit: Educational Media International and David Corke
brief_description: Film producer and author David Corke, first presents the traditional story, then invites us to examine the original historic sources. How did Burke and Wills really die? Does the legend depicted in the story, film and pictures fit the facts? Includes multi-level presentations and commentary, historic diary extracts, articles and documents, useful and informative maps, facts about other famous Australian explorers and a detailed study guide with student activities.
